title: Properties of definite integrals with graph

content.question: The regions A, B, and C in the figure above are bounded by the graph of the function f and the x-axis. If the area of each region is 2, what is the value of <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <mrow> <msubsup> <mo>∫</mo> <mrow> <mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn> </mrow> <mn>3</mn> </msubsup> <mrow> <mrow><mo>(</mo> <mrow> <mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn> </mrow> <mo>)</mo></mrow> </mrow> </mrow> </mstyle><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@43C6@</annotation> </semantics> </math>?

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
